extension.name: Simple File Lister v1.0 (for Joomla 3)
extension.author: Anders Wasen
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2011-2012 Anders Was√©n. All rights reserved.
extension.description: A simple module that will list files from a directory set in the settings. Will allow a user to list the given directory fetched from the parameter settings.

field.name: sfl_dirlocation
field.label: Default Directory
field.description: This is a default directory that will be listed.

field.name: sfl_basepath
field.label: Web server base path (http://xyz...)
field.description: You need to add the baseurl for teh above directory, inluding the directory to use for creating the web-links. It must start with http/https or ftp. E.g. if your directory to list is ./images in your Joomla root this should be http://www.mysamplesite.com/images/

field.name: sfl_maxfiles
field.label: Max. files to list
field.description: This is the maximum allowed files to list. Set it to zero for no limit.

field.name: sfl_next
field.label: Use Next button
field.description: Add Next/Previous buttons if list exceeds Max. files to list.

field.name: sfl_showfilesize
field.label: Show file size
field.description: Will add teh filesize after the file name.

field.name: sfl_maxheight
field.label: Max. box height (in pixels)
field.description: This is the maximum allowed height for the file list box in pixels. Set it to zero to let it grow.

field.name: sfl_bgcolor
field.label: Background color
field.description: The background color of the file list box.

field.name: sfl_onlyimg
field.label: List only images
field.description: List only images or all files in directory.

field.name: sfl_imgthumbs
field.label: Use thumbnails
field.description: Use thumbnails for images. Select Only to not show file-name, only thumb-nail image.

field.name: sfl_thumbheight
field.label: Max. thumbnail height (in pixels)
field.description: This is the maximum allowed height for a thumbnail.

field.name: sfl_thumbkeepaspect
field.label: Keep aspect ratio of thumbnail
field.description: Use thumbnails in correct aspect ratio, else they will be resized into max. height/width.

field.name: sfl_listdir
field.label: List directories
field.description: Also list sub-directories ontop of the files.

field.name: sfl_browsedir
field.label: Browse sub-directory
field.description: Allow the user to enter sub-directories.

field.name: sfl_useusernameddir
field.label: Use user named directory
field.description: This will show the logged on users files instead of the default path given above.

field.name: sfl_usernameddirdefault
field.label: ONLY show user named directory
field.description: Will omit the default directory from directory list. Directory list will only contain the users own files, i.e. Default Directory above will never be used!.

field.name: sfl_userlocation
field.label: User named directories root path
field.description: This is the directory where uploaded files for user specific files are placed (NB! Server path, not web URL). E.g. the user Anders files would be under ./users/Anders/.

field.name: sfl_basepathusr
field.label: Web server users path (http://xyz...)
field.description: If your Default User Directory lies outside of the Joomla web-root or you are using sub-domains you need to add the baseurl, inluding the directory to use for creating the web-links. It must start with http/https or ftp

field.label: Do you like it?
field.description: Feel like showing your appreciation? Build: 1.0.2.0

field.name: sfl_allowupdir
field.label: Allow moving up in directories
field.description: This is NOT recommended! This will allow a user to add a path for moving backwards in directorystructure, beyond your Default Directory, using the AJAX query URL.

field.name: sfl_allowdelete
field.label: Allow delete files
field.description: This is NOT recommended! To allow delete of files you must enable this first.

field.name: sfl_allowdeleteall
field.label: Allow delete files for all
field.description: This is NOT recommended! It will allow any user (even not logged in) to delete files from the list.

field.name: sfl_allowdeletereg
field.label: Allow delete files for registered
field.description: This is NOT recommended! It will allow any registered user to delete files from the list.

field.name: sfl_allowdeleteedt
field.label: Allow delete files for editors
field.description: It will allow any user registered as editor to delete files from the list.

field.name: sfl_movedeleted
field.label: Move instead of delete
field.description: If you want to move files instead of deleting them to the directory below.

field.name: sfl_movedeletedpath
field.label: Move to directory for deleted
field.description: If you want to move files instead of delete they will end up in this directory. If the directory does not exist it will be created. Files will get a unique file extension to not overwrite existing files.

field.name: sfl_disablegdthreshold
field.label: GD library size limit
field.description: This is the threshold (max size in bytes) for where GD library should not be used. Set to zero for no threshold.

field.name: cache
field.label: Joomla Cache
field.description: Here you can enable/disable Joomla caching

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache time
field.description: Cache time

field.name: sfl_showdir
field.label: Show directory label
field.description: Show the path of the directory listed.

field.name: sfl_showicon
field.label: Show icons
field.description: Show an icon in front of the directory or file.

field.name: sfl_sortorder
field.label: Default sort order
field.description: Default sort order of files.

field.name: sfl_showsort
field.label: Show user sort option
field.description: Show arrows for sorting Asc/Desc to user.

field.name: sfl_boxleft
field.label: Lister box left position
field.description: In some templates the box with the list is pushed too far to the left. Change this value to move the box to the left (reduce value) or to the right (increase value).

field.name: sfl_listleft
field.label: List left position
field.description: In some templates the list is pushed too far to the left. Change this value to move the list inside the box to the left (reduce value) or to the right (increase value).

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: Module Class Suffix
